project.description:
This job will download / update the gen3-client
It will also configure a default profile for gen3-client to use.
You will need an api-key from gen3 in order to run this job.

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: __CREDIENTIALS__
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: Paste the gen3 api credientials.json file here

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
curl https://api.github.com/repos/uc-cdis/cdis-data-client/releases/latest | grep browser_download_url.*linux | cut -d '"' -f 4 | wget -qi -
unzip -o dataclient_linux.zip
cp gen3-client /usr/local/bin/ | cp gen3-client /usr/bin/
set +x
echo ${__CREDIENTIALS__} > credientials.json
set -x
gen3-client configure --profile=jenkins --cred=credientials.json --apiendpoint=${__API_END_POINT__}
rm -rf credientials.json
